title: US Vice President Harris announces new assistance for Caribbean
description: The vice president met with regional leaders in the Bahamas to discuss gun crimes, climate change and Haiti's crisis.

title: US officer testifies about response to Parkland school massacre

title: Millions under hazy skies as Canadian wildfire smoke spreads

title: Guinea-Bissau opposition wins majority in parliamentary polls
description: The legislative elections are the first since President Embalo dissolved parliament more than a year ago.

title: Russian man killed in shark attack off Egypt’s Red Sea resort
description: Coastline to remain off limits with a ban on swimming, snorkelling and other water sports activities until Sunday.

title: ‘Enduring commitment’: Key takeaways from US-GCC joint statement

title: ‘Real good shape’: Biden-Sunak hail ties at White House meet

title: El Nino under way, raising fears of extreme weather patterns

title: US Supreme Court rules in favour of Alabama Black voters

title: Pat Robertson, who brought religion into US politics, dies at 93

title: USAID says it is halting all food aid to Ethiopia amid diversions

title: Party with controversy: Spain’s festival of Moors and Christians

title: Planet warming at ‘unprecedented rate’, study finds
